ISSUE.TITLE: Multi-step checkout in pickup point select on get error message in new address
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: nopCommerce 4.60-Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Step 1: Go to Admin => Configuration => Settings => Order Settings Step 2: Disabled **Use one page checkout** Checkbox Step 3: Add Product into cart and click on Checkout button Step 4: Unchecked **Ship to the same address** checkbox on billing step and click on continue button Step 5: Checked **Pickup** checkbox and click on next button Step 6: You can see new address required message (validation) https://prnt.sc/dAde56XGtBIl

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6451 Fixed incorrect price range filter when selected price is the most minimal
